Field Record Definition for Detailed Design

Oct 22, 2008 â€¢ {"login"=>"evlpanda", "email"=>"m.nitschke@gmail.com", "display_name"=>"Michael Nitschke", "first_name"=>"", "last_name"=>""}

run, copy and paste (work in progess):

DEFINE RECNAME = 'UQ_BNK_RCN_PAYM';
-- FIELD, KEY, SEARCHKEY, LIST, REQ, EDIT, PROMPT TABLE, DEFAULT
SELECT
FIELDNAME AS FIELD
, ' ' AS KEY
, ' ' AS SEARCHKEY
, ' ' AS LISTT
, ' ' AS REQ
, ' ' AS EDIT
, ' ' AS PROMPTTABLE
, ' ' AS DEFAULTT
FROM PSRECFIELD
WHERE RECNAME = &RECNAME
ORDER BY FIELDNUM
;
